content.text:
# 16th Hollywood Music in Media Awards

}}
The 16th Hollywood Music in Media Awards recognized the best in music in film, TV, video games, commercials, and trailers of 2025. The ceremony was held on November 19, 2025, at The Avalon in Hollywood, and was livestreamed globally for the first time, on the Laurel Canyon Live app.
The nominations were announced on November 5, 2025. The musical Wicked: For Good led the nominations with six, followed by the film Sinners and the video game Valorant, with five each. The ceremony featured performances from A. R. Rahman, Diane Warren, Kesha, Aiyana-Lee, Jeff Beal, and Aryana Sayeed.
